revised_title: On Some New and Typical Micro-organisms Obtained from Water and Soil
tldr: The authors, Grace C. Frankland and Percy F. Frankland, present a detailed description of new micro-organisms, specifically Bacilli and Micrococci, obtained from various natural waters. They compare these aquatic micro-organisms to those found in the atmosphere and highlight the differences between the two, with micrococci being predominant in the air and bacillar forms dominating in water.
